trends: There have been no other sightings in Martin
This sighting has never been favorited.
Summary: Two lights, traveling west, slow speed. No sound, solid light.
divs: sighting detailsi was feeding my dog, looked up seeing two solid lights traveling north east. the light appeared to be attached to the same object. at arms length it would have taken two dollar bills end to end to cover it up. usally when i see aircraft i can al least hear the engine, or rotors. i estimate a altitude of about 2000feet, not sure for it being dark outside was judgeing in relation to the mountains. i watched this thing for about 1 1\2 minutes before it vanished. didn't have a camera or phone with me, was feeding my dog not expecting to see anything that needed recording. for some reason i couldn't look away, guess i was amazed to see something like that.
